nodes.text: The Fabritech 7Y4 sensor suite was a component used in the Lantillian ShipWrights GX1 Short Hauler starship. In 22 BBY, the corporation had to recall all GX1s with serial prefixes TRE-0034 through TRE-5215 due to faulty electronics, thousands of GX1s having left the assembly line with malfunctioning 7Y4 sensor suites, although Fabritech officials claimed that it was Lantillian's mishandling that resulted in the hardware problems.
